column1: Yesan (Korean: [je.san]) is a county in South Chungcheong Province
column2: South Korea.  Famous people from Yesan include independence fighter Yoon Bong-Gil.
a head temple of the Jogye Order of Korean Buddhism
column3: is located on the southern slopes of Deoksungsan in Deoksan-myeon
column4: Yesan County. Its main hall is daeungjeon (大雄殿)
column5: Korea's oldest wooden building and National Treasure 49.
